overview: Praveen is a general management and corporate finance professional, business consultant and has a wide International network especially through his association of CNSG Consulting Group in Singapore and Miracle Capital in China/Malaysia. He network include High Net worth Individuals, Angle Investors, Mid Size Investment Companies and various small and medium size business in varied sectors. He specializes in Corporate Finance Concepts, early stage technology investments & Market Entry. He has worked on preparing business plans and conducting road shows to raising investments and provides strategic tie ups. His current assignment at NASSCOM allows his to network with many startup companies and senior leaders in Technology Industry. His strength lies in putting available resources together and facilitating Strategic Decision in the business or transition he is involved. He exposed to hybrid business models which are generally embedded into layers of business plan. Praveen also has, Entrepreneurship, business background through his family controlled business from Energy, Building Material, and Infrastructure development.
